name: Ether One
summary: Ether One is a first-person adventure game developed by British independent company White Paper Games. It was the studio's debut game and was originally released for Microsoft Windows on March 25, 2014. A PlayStation 4 edition was released on May 5, 2015.
info:
• 开发: White Paper Games
  • 发行: White Paper Games
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 3
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: March 25, 2014
  • 官方网站: https://ether-game.com/
